View Javadoc
1   package org.infinispan.configuration.cache;
2   
3   import org.infinispan.commons.configuration.Builder;
4   import org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration;
5   
6   /**
7    * SecurityConfigurationBuilder.
8    *
9    * @author Tristan Tarrant
10   * @since 7.0
11   */
12  public class SecurityConfigurationBuilder extends AbstractConfigurationChildBuilder implements SecurityConfigurationChildBuilder, Builder<SecurityConfiguration> {
13     private final AuthorizationConfigurationBuilder authorizationBuilder;
14  
15     public SecurityConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationBuilder builder) {
16        super(builder);
17        authorizationBuilder = new AuthorizationConfigurationBuilder(this);
18     }
19  
20     @Override
21     public void validate() {
22     }
23  
24     @Override
25     public void validate(GlobalConfiguration globalConfig) {
26     }
27  
28     @Override
29     public SecurityConfiguration create() {
30        return new SecurityConfiguration(authorizationBuilder.create());
31     }
32  
33     @Override
34     public SecurityConfigurationBuilder read(SecurityConfiguration template) {
35        this.authorizationBuilder.read(template.authorization());
36        return this;
37     }
38  
39     @Override
40     public AuthorizationConfigurationBuilder authorization() {
41        return authorizationBuilder;
42     }
43  }
